text: The Forum for Democracy and Development (FDD) is a political party in Zambia. The FDD was founded in 2001 by former members of the Movement for Multi-Party Democracy (MMD) not happy with Frederick Chiluba's works to change the constitution to allow him to fun for a third term. ==References== Category:Political parties in Zambia Category:2001 establishments in Africa Category:Establishments in Zambia
title: Forum for Democracy and Development
